    • Constructor Detail

      • Editor

        public Editor(StatusLabel statusLabel)
        Editor instantiated with default slot 'A1'. Editor objects listen to SlotLabels for SelectEvents and to themselves for KeyEvents.

    • Method Detail

      • selectEventOccured

        public void selectEventOccured(SelectEvent event)
        The Editor keeps track of the currentSlot by listening for a SlotLabel to fire a SelectEvent. It will also display the current content of the slot if any. (i.e. content = comment or expression String)
        Specified by:
        selectEventOccured in interface SelectListener

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        When the Enter key is pressed, the Editor will check the syntax of the text that the user has input to the textField. If the syntax of the text is correct, it will fire a SubmitEvent with the text to all SubmitListeners that have registered with it. If the text syntax is not correct, an ExceptionEvent with the error text will be fired to all ExceptionListeners registered with the Editor.
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener

      • update
